alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 9:03PM CDT until September 19 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of The Village, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, The Village, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Arcadia, Forest Park, and Lake Aluma. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
